article_title: Country artist Randy Houser headlining Bridget’s Gift event
article_text:

og.description: This year’s Western Dance and Barbecue hosted by Bridget’s Gift doesn’t roll around until Oct. 4, but tickets are sure rolling out the box office stampede style.
